name: Automotive Carpet 3D
description:
A Virtual Automotive Carpet!

This is a Sandbox Game, where you can drive with Toy Cars on a virtual carpet.

The Story behind the Game

In my Childhood, I played a lot with Toy cars and now I created a virtual Automotive Carpet in 3D for this Game-Jam

Report a bug!

If you find a bug, please dm me on Discord. My Discord name is: samu_g05tz#3061
